infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Allow to access camera. The usage of the camera is necessary so that the user can take a picture and adjust or update the user's avatar in the application profile settings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Allow to access photo library. The usage of the photo library is necessary so that the user can upload an image to the application to customize or update the user's avatar in the application profile settings.
